title: 820-2849 same cap issue as 820-2850?
message:
Are the 820-2849 boards susceptible to the same tantalum-capacitor failure as the 820-2850 boards? If so, what's the best procedure for replacing C9560 and C9510? The space to fit a proper poly-film cap is basically non-existent. What's the best way to cram proper caps in there without causing any issues? I have a few 2849 boards that seem to be having similar GPU power circuit issues, and I didn't see too much on here with regards to tantalum cap failure on the 2849 (relative to the 2850).

Thanks in advance as always.

title: 820-2849 same cap issue as 820-2850?
message: No, on 2849 it is the GPU or VRAM.
